FileSystemObserver.summary: CAUTION Non-standard The FileSystemObserver interface of the {{domxref("File System API", "File System API", "", "nocode")}} provides a mechanism to observe changes to the user-observable file system and the Origin Private File System (OPFS). This means web applications don't have to poll the file system to find changes in the files or folder structure, which can be time-consuming and wasteful.

remarks.para:
-File System API
-The File System Observer API origin trial on developer.chrome.com (2024)
